::Hot Rod::

He wraped his left arm around her waist.
"Dont worry, I'll give him the info. I am an Alliance member now. Oh,
when do you think we'll battle Maxi's? I promised one, that I would kill
her."

::DrillBit::

He got up, and searched for KitKat.
